jobTitle: Data and Policy Analyst—Operations Coordinator (Research Operations Team)
jobDescription: Acumen, LLC and The SPHERE Institute conduct data analysis of health care policy at the national, state, and local levels. We leverage our unparalleled data access to improve information available to policymakers, helping to promote evidence-based policy decisions. We are looking for a Coordinator to manage the day-to-day work of the Research Operations team. The Research Operations team oversees the organization and tracking of internal development activities. Its primary responsibilities include coordinating communication between Acumen’s research teams and other departments and the development of internal resources.We are looking for candidates interested in: (i) tracking Research Operations activities, including all requests, assignments, and meetings; (ii) monitoring request timelines; (iii) maintaining the project management database; (iv) assisting in and documenting meetings; (v) communicating request specifications and updates to internal teams; (vi) drafting project status reports and summaries for company-wide progress updates; and (vii) helping to create internal resources for Acumen’s researchers.
